titleStmt.title: Whereas our very good Lord Richard Lord Viscount Ranelagh and his partners by their contract with His Majesty passed under the great seal of England ... by the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland, Essex.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 4 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin, the eighteenth day of February, 1672. The 25th year of His Majesties reign"--leaf [3]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
